question: “Thalivi”, is a biopic based on the life of which politician?
explanation: Kangana Ranaut has begun shooting for her next film Thalaivi in which she will essay the role of legendary Tamil actress and politician Jayalalithaa. The film which is being titled Thalaivi in Tamil will reportedly be titled Jaya in Hindi.According to the latest reports, ‘Thalivi’ is in trouble as Jayalalithaa\'s niece reportedly approached the Madras High Court seeking a stay on the film.
